statements: SELECT * FROM FoodMagazineArticles ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM FoodMagazineArticles WHERE category = 'Recipes' LIMIT 10;
SELECT title, category, author FROM FoodMagazineArticles WHERE reader_engagement > 100 ORDER BY reader_engagement DESC;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM FoodMagazineArticles ORDER BY author ASC, publication_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM FoodMagazineArticles WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM FoodMagazineArticles WHERE author = 'John Doe' AND category = 'Recipes'
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM FoodMagazineArticles ORDER BY publication_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_articles FROM FoodMagazineArticles
SELECT title, author, category, reader_engagement FROM FoodMagazineArticles WHERE reader_engagement > 100 ORDER BY reader_engagement DESC
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS total_articles_written FROM FoodMagazineArticles GROUP BY author HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE category = 'Technology';
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(reader_engagement) AS avg_engagement FROM articles;
SELECT title, author FROM articles WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT author, COUNT(id) AS article_count FROM articles GROUP BY author ORDER BY article_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE category = 'Technology' ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, author FROM articles WHERE reader_engagement > 1000 ORDER BY reader_engagement DESC, publication_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT a.id, a.title, b.name AS author_name FROM articles a JOIN authors b ON a.author = b.id WHERE b.email LIKE '%@example.com' ORDER BY a.publication_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT title, category, author, publication_date FROM articles WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY publication_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS article_count FROM articles GROUP BY author HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY article_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE category = 'Technology';
SELECT article_id, author, publication_date FROM articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM authors WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM categories WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE reader_engagement > 100 ORDER BY reader_engagement DESC, publication_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT author, COUNT(article_id) AS article_count FROM articles GROUP BY author HAVING COUNT(article_id) > 3;
SELECT author, SUM(reader_engagement) AS total_engagement FROM articles GROUP BY author ORDER BY total_engagement DESC;
SELECT articles.article_id, articles.category, authors.author_name FROM articles JOIN authors ON articles.author = authors.author_name;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(article_id) AS article_count FROM articles JOIN categories ON articles.category = categories.category_name GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY article_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Category;
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM Category ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM Author WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT article_title, publication_date FROM Article WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT engagement_score, engagement_date FROM ReaderEngagement WHERE engagement_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM Category WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM Author ORDER BY author_name ASC;
SELECT article_title, publication_date FROM Article WHERE category_id = 2 ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Article WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT author_name, article_title, engagement_score FROM Author JOIN Article ON Author.author_id = Article.author_id JOIN ReaderEngagement ON Article.article_id = ReaderEngagement.article_id WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Categories;
SELECT article_id, title, publication_date FROM Articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT author_id, first_name, last_name FROM Authors WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT category_name FROM Categories WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT reader_id, username FROM Readers ORDER BY reader_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Categories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT title, publication_date, views FROM Articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, COUNT(*) AS total_articles FROM Authors JOIN Articles ON Authors.author_id = Articles.author_id GROUP BY Authors.author_id;
SELECT username, engagement_type, engagement_date FROM Readers JOIN Engagements ON Readers.reader_id = Engagements.reader_id WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_articles FROM Categories LEFT JOIN Articles ON Categories.category_id = Articles.category_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY total_articles DESC;
